ingredientSchema: {"definitions":{},"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#","$id":"http://example.com/root.json","type":"array","title":"The Root Schema","items":{"$id":"#/items","type":"object","title":"The Items Schema","required":["price","_id","name","type","abv","quantity"],"properties":{"price":{"$id":"#/items/properties/price","type":"object","title":"The Price Schema","required":["cost","unitOfMeasure"],"properties":{"cost":{"$id":"#/items/properties/price/properties/cost","type":"number","title":"The Cost Schema","default":0},"unitOfMeasure":{"$id":"#/items/properties/price/properties/unitOfMeasure","type":"string","title":"The Unitofmeasure Schema","default":"","examples":["mL"],"pattern":"^(.*)$"}}},"_id":{"$id":"#/items/properties/_id","type":"string","title":"The _id Schema","default":"","pattern":"^(.*)$"},"name":{"$id":"#/items/properties/name","type":"string","title":"The Name Schema","default":"","pattern":"^(.*)$"},"type":{"$id":"#/items/properties/type","type":"string","title":"The Type Schema","default":"","pattern":"^(.*)$"},"abv":{"$id":"#/items/properties/abv","type":"integer","title":"The Abv Schema","default":0},"quantity":{"$id":"#/items/properties/quantity","type":"integer","title":"The Quantity Schema","default":0}}}}
ingredientListSchema: {"definitions":{},"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#","$id":"http://example.com/root.json","type":"object","title":"The Root Schema","required":["filters","ingredients","_id","name"],"properties":{"filters":{"$id":"#/properties/filters","type":"array","title":"The Filters Schema"},"ingredients":{"$id":"#/properties/ingredients","type":"array","title":"The Ingredients Schema"},"_id":{"$id":"#/properties/_id","type":"string","title":"The _id Schema","default":"","examples":["5bf96f2009fc72171c6dac24"],"pattern":"^(.*)$"},"name":{"$id":"#/properties/name","type":"string","title":"The Name Schema","default":"","examples":["Test List"],"pattern":"^(.*)$"}}}
